title: S.C.I Mystery Series - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Comedy   Drama   Horror   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Drama CD   Bickering Couple   Childhood Friends   Crime   Cute Story   Detectives   Enemies Become Lovers   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Leadership   Manly Gay Couple   Mind Control   Murders   Mystery Solving   Police   Power Couple   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   Smart Couple   Teamwork   Wealthy Characters

description:
Every investigation assigned to the S.C.I team are mass murders, committed by unpredictable serial killers with horrendous and gruesome methods of slaughter. However, amidst of the gory crime scenes and the fiery battles of wit, the love of the young men in the team still blooms...

>
